docs.title: Micromouse DSL Documentation
docs.text:
Welcome! This site explains how to write scripts for the Micromouse simulator.

  • Getting Started — your first maze-solving script
  • Reference — detailed command docs

docs.title: Getting Started
docs.text:
1. Open the editor panel.
  2. Write your first script:
LOOP
    MOVE
  1. Press Run to see the mouse wander indefinitely.
  2. Try adding IF SENSOR FRONT PROX to stop the mouse when it detects an obstacle:
LOOP
    IF SENSOR FRONT PROX
        BREAK
    MOVE

docs.title: Movement Commands
docs.text:
• MOVE Moves the mouse forward by one cell (distance defined in globals.gd).

  • LEFT Rotates the mouse 90° left.

  • RIGHT Rotates the mouse 90° right.
